lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility
lenders.occupational_info: attracting new students to attend college so they can better their career opportunities

lenders.name: Karuana
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a better life for yourself.  I'm happy to help someone else in their work to live a better life. We are all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to make better decisions for their family and relationships.

lenders.name: Laurence
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it does good. People need a chance to show what they can do for themselves.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping one another is a path to world peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach government workers technical writing and ethics, especially about using their authority wisely.

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to as many people as possible. Just a small way to give back for all that I have been given in life.

lenders.name: Ginger
lenders.loan_because: No one deserves to suffer because of where or to whom they were born. Only when the global community comes together to relieve each other of the day-to-day struggle of living can we even begin to make true human progress.My mother is a refugee from Cambodia and my parents toiled to raise me. I feel like contributing to others helps me repay the debt I owe to them, and as a way to help other children grow up in safe, nurturing communities.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: every person deserves an opportunity to pursue a dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Mom to a baby girl

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: My father was a cowboy. I loan in his memory, he who helped so many. My uncle, his brother, just passed away and I also loan in his memory.
lenders.occupational_info: I like learning, about anything but especially about how things work in other countries. I am amazed at the ingenuity of humankind in figuring out ways to better themselves and their families and honored to be able to enable some people to realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Noelle
lenders.loan_because: We all need each other to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm part of the airplane team who helps people to travel around the world.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because:
I can and have been enabled to do so.

"We are the generation that can, therefore we are the generation that must." (Bono)

but more importantly:

"Do not withold good from those who deserve it, when it is in your power to act."    -Proverbs 3:27
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a  Clemson University student, but more importantly, I am a Christ Follower who has been blessed far beyond what I could ever imagine or certainly deserve. God has given me the life he has for a reason and has enabled me to serve others, so I will.  I am so blessed to be able to serve and glorify Him, especially in such a capacity as this.

lenders.name: Jung-chieh
lenders.loan_because: Try to be good

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: there is need and Kiva.org seems like an effect way to make positive change happen faster.
lenders.occupational_info: Analyze risk associated lending company's money.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: The best way to help people is to help them stand on their own and be productive.
lenders.occupational_info: I help big companies organize their information.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: who wouldn't?
lenders.occupational_info: a student

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: (1) it is  the right thing to  do.  (2) It is good fortune that I have the education and resources that I have;  therefore I need to share them.(3) I want to  be a silent stakeholder in the businesses I help so I  can watch them grow and  celebrate their success.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach reading and study skills to first year college students helping them make the adjustment from high school to college

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: So they can have a business that works well and provides money to their families
lenders.occupational_info: I've been involved in Pace University's Model Montessori UN (MMUN) program.  The picture of me was taken in the UN general assembly hall.

lenders.name: TERESA
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to raise a family

lenders.name: Kenji Iwase
lenders.loan_because: Payback for the people who helped me and my wife during travel all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Now I impotr US soybeans (for tofu), wheat and Cnadian canola (for crush).

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.loan_because: Without other people's helping hands, I would not be where I am today.
lenders.occupational_info: I make  the technical functions of software understandable to the sales team, press and analyst.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: People deserve a chance to better themselves/ situations!
lenders.occupational_info: I sell Beauty Products ( Shampoo, Styling Products and Salon Equipment to Salons )

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to do good things and help the world economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a U.S. Marine.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I want to see God's redemptive work around the world, and figure this a good way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help cities run better.

lenders.name: Mark Holmes
lenders.loan_because: The world is a better place when everyone has a chance to follow their dreams.  My experiences living in Guatemala taught me that $25 can mean the difference between eating or not.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer in the medical billing industry.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: These borrowers pay back their loans at a FAR greater rate than borrowers at any bank in the United States.  I have made hundreds of loans and have not had a single default.  I believe that my loans are really helping to make a difference in the lives of these people.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Because it's a great way to make a worth while investment in a persons life. It's an honor to be able to partner with someone who is pursuing a dream, goal or simply looking for an avenue to better care for themselves and their family,
lenders.occupational_info: My company provides Marketing and Management solutions designed for small and medium size businesses.  I also speak on the subject of economic development.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help people who want to help themselves all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have difficulty with communication.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It's the type of charity that keeps on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses grow through connecting buyers and sellers online.

lenders.name: Meredith
lenders.loan_because:
it's the right thing to do.  Knowing that the money is going directly to the people in need makes it feel that much better.  A small amount to me can be life changing to someone else.  

I wish I could do more.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.  Entrepreneurs can have a conscience too!
lenders.occupational_info: I helped found Vancouver's first Cohousing project.

lenders.name: Donayt
lenders.loan_because: We have so much to offer yet give so little. It is time we helped to make a change in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
Donayt is a search engine that allows internet users everywhere to make a difference.
Spread the word and help Donayt change the world.

lenders.name: M&M
lenders.loan_because:
It's an enabler of opportunities and does not create a dependence on charity.

Let's be honest, the act of "loaning" for a social cause is it's own benefit.  In other words, I feel better about myself just by participating, and believing that I can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Help companies determine if their cell phone causes TV or radio problems.

lenders.name: Kerrien
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is everyone's problem. It cuts across any line you can name: age, race, social, geographic or religious. Whether you are black or white; rich, middle-class or poor, we are ALL touched by poverty.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: It is only a small loan, but I like the idea of being able to help someone less fortunate than myself in a most constructive way.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with numbers and other people has always been a very rewarding  My job is Interesting, varied and most certainly a challenge.

lenders.name: EVE
lenders.loan_because: It's fast, easy, and feels good to be making a real difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home to care for our four children, who home school.  My husband has a chimney cleaning/lining business.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I am happy when I can help

lenders.name: Friends in Fredonia
lenders.loan_because: We believe it is one of the best things we can do.
lenders.occupational_info: We are trying to add the little bit we can to try to reach a tipping point ...

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower individuals to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am teaching English at Osaka Christian College in Osaka, Japan for one year.

lenders.name: Kimi
lenders.loan_because: I know that building a strong economy is one of the best long-term way to change lives. And I believe that educated locals can make better choices than most foreigners, so the money and the power goes to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I study psychology.

lenders.name: Beit Ariella
lenders.loan_because: Jewish sages teach that the greatest form of tzedakah (charity) is making a loan to help a person start their own business.  Kiva lets me do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers on a daily basis.

lenders.name: Marit Bromark
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help change the world.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because:
An old man walking along the beach at dawn sees a young man picking up a starfish and throwing them out to sea. 

"Why are you doing that?" The old man inquired. The young man explained that the starfish had been stranded on the beach by the receding tide and they'd soon die in the daytime sun. 

"But the beach goes on for miles," the old man said. "And there's so many! How can your effort make any difference?"

The young man looked at the starfish in his hand and without hesitating threw it to safety in the sea. 

He looked up at the old man, smiled and said, "It will make a difference to that one."

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: i can!
lenders.occupational_info: i help people operate stores.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I beleive these people deserve a chance to get out of poverty which is artificially created by few greedy people or nations.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: its a great way to have a personal connection to people the world over.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make better laws for communities in the coalfields of the Appalachian mountains.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: We have too much and it should be shared.
lenders.occupational_info: Software.

lenders.name: Daryn and Lily
lenders.loan_because: the people I loan to get more bang for the buck than I do
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are both consultants in the IT Industry.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I feel loaning money through Kiva is a way I can help someone who is trying to improve the quality of life for themselves and their family but  needs a little assistance.  I've been blessed in so many ways  in my life and I feel it's the right thing to do to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I'm not working at a "paying" job at this time, so I have the privilige of volunteering at several local agencies who help make a difference in the lives of those less fortunate.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help those less fortunate.  I'm happy that I'm able to do this and thankful to kiva for enabling these loans to be made.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a volunteer management consultant for nonprofits.

lenders.name: Josh and Shey
lenders.loan_because: it is a good thing to do.

lenders.name: Vadim
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a hand up not a hand out, a great idea someone once had. I believe the only way to improve this world and enrich everyones life is by bringing up economy, and giving a purpose and direction to peoples lives. And with my limited experience, capabilities, knowledge and resources, this is the best outlet for my beliefs.
lenders.occupational_info: Aside from being a full time student, I also consult and sell wireless communication products and services.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I wanted world peace for my birthday.

lenders.name: SALIOU
lenders.loan_because: I loan some money so that I can revalorize my trade and put a some money for my studyies, because it is me who pays my studyies with my small trade and the studyies of my little brother. I am a student in physic, but I want to mak computer ingineering, but it is necessary to have some money. It is for that after my courses, I do a little job, and a little trade to meet my needs and pay my study fees.
lenders.occupational_info: At the beginning I worked like a receptionist, after a coffee manager, to start. After I took my economis to buy goods, to eat, and cigarettes, and the various ones which I resells after the courses. It is like that my trade is going on.

lenders.name: TreeGoddess
lenders.loan_because: Providing for your family is priceless.  Being able to lending a small amount of money to help someone achieve this makes me feel like I'm helping to make the world a better place for all of our children.

lenders.name: Bridget
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I CAN AND THERE IS A NEED WHEN I WAS IN NEED PEOPLE WHO COULD, DID AND NOW THANKS TO THEM I CAN SO THIS IS MY THANKS TO THEM TO CARRY ON WHAT THEY STARTED WITH ME
lenders.occupational_info: I AM A UNIT OPERATOR IN A REFINERY MAKING PETRO PRODUCTS I GIVE THE REPAID FUNDS  TO THE NEXT LOAN SO THAT THE PEOPLE WHO REPAY ARE THE ONES LOANING INSTEAD OF ME  IT IS THEY WHO KEEP THE WORLD TURNING empowered by the fact that repaying their loans make them the lender and no longer the borrower,a force set in motion that changes lives.!!!!!!YES!!!!!!

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: There is no need for poverty on this abundent planet. I started a business from nothing and it is now very successfull and I want to share that and hope the recipients will in turn help others. It's a small world after all!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fashion designer and clothing manufactorer and retailer.

lenders.name: Marti
lenders.loan_because: I can make more of a difference with several loans rather than one donation. It is so rewarding and fullfilling, why wouldn't you want to help someone?

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: From each according to his ability, to each according to his need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help wire homes and businesses to use the energy from the sun to provide their electricity.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Who doesn't need a helping hand?
lenders.occupational_info: Creating Shelter - one home at a time

lenders.name: Rick & Laura Rabner
lenders.loan_because: We like knowing that we can have an impact, however small.
lenders.occupational_info: Rick is an attorney and Laura is a marketing and tourism manager with a real estate company specializing in retail.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I have been given way more than I need.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I hope my small loans help make a difference for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell houses.

lenders.name: Dolores
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who need help.

lenders.name: Vincent
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving back
lenders.occupational_info: I produce two daily international newscasts .

lenders.name: art
lenders.loan_because: i believe that hard working people should be helped.

lenders.name: Chris D.
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this model is an inspiring and sustainable way to alleviate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in energy finance, particularly lending to renewable energy projects.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: My life has been so blessed and I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise Student Teachers who are in the process of earning their Mathematics teaching credentials.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: so many other people have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people record information about their own native languages and I teach students how to communicate with people from other cultures.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I designed, oversaw construction, inspected and operated traffic signalized intersections and systems in Southwestern Pennsylvania around Pittsburgh.

lenders.name: Dan , Ann & Amanda
lenders.loan_because:
Dan; I started and built my business because someone trusted me and made me a loan.
Ann; I want to help someone with a dream~
Amanda; Our daughter wants to help people in need for their businesses
lenders.occupational_info: I got my first home loan 25 years ago. I lived in that home while I fixed it up and sold it for a profit. I fell in love with Real Estate and went full time 20 years ago. I fix and sell homes, have rentals and loan cash to home owners. I love my work and the great abundance it has provided.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to reach their goals.  Sometimes it takes just a little help to realize a dream.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Funding a recipient's aspirations can have a profound and lasting effect.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: My students and I held a car wash to raise money for KIVA because we wanted to do something to help others in need.  We donated $100 to four business we wanted to support.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a middle school teacher at a small school in Jackson, Wyoming.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: if you give a man a fish, he will eat for a day; if you teach a man to fish, he will eat for life.  Cheesy, cliche, but very, very true.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that all of the money in a company is tracked and recorded accurately.  Basically, I do a lot of math for a living.

lenders.name: Tristan PM
lenders.loan_because: loans change lives

lenders.name: Kathy, Jeff, Jake, Molly
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life even if it's just a little bit at a time.  If I need help, I hope someone will have compassion for me so I want to do the same.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that I may be able to help someone build a better life for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have several people in my life to lend me a hand when I needed help.  I hope that I can do the same for someone.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I can help others, and I get the money back to give to someone else? Why the heck wouldn't you do this?
lenders.occupational_info: I compose music for movies and TV shows.

lenders.name: Raouf & Mahasti
lenders.loan_because: we are originally from Iran and now Canadian Citizens. We wouldn't be in this country if this chance had not been given to us by nice Canadian people. We understand that if we were in Iran we could not be any help to others since we could not make enough money ( comparing to a professional in Canada)! So by doing this, hope to be a little bit useful for others. If anybody just can put aside 1% of his/her salary each month, it is going to be something for people in developing countries!

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I've been looking for a direct way of help people in other parts of the world and Kiva seems to be just what I'm looking for.   Love seeing a picture and knowing more about the people who I lend money too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from full time work.   I did computer programming for over 30 years.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because:
The stories of both the borrowers and the lenders are truly inspiring, 
and the possibilities for this world are truly incredible.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney.

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: I want to see as many as possible lifted out of poverty, and the only way to do that is through economic opportunity and freedom, not gifts
lenders.occupational_info: I support trading systems in global bank

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing way to assist people to become self sufficient.

lenders.name: Roz
lenders.occupation: Mom of 3,  Wife of 1 & RT to many in need
lenders.loan_because: Even though we are not rich and my husband works 2 labor intensive jobs and I spend many hours every week at my job, my family still has more than others.  I am blessed and grateful.  As I know those who need help are.  So why not help even if it is something small.  Every small act of kindness ends up something bigger to that someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who have trouble breathing or live with respiratory illnesses.  I work in emergency situations or just with every day medications.  I concentrate on the lungs (pulmonary system) and even help those who get really sick and need to be put on a machine to breath till they get better.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: any little bit helps.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses grow  by letting others know more about what they do.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I was once at a hard place with small chidren to raise. I hope to help others smile because they too can do it!  good luck
lenders.occupational_info: I give people new hair  styles. It makes people feel good to look good. It also helps to get and keep jobs in the US

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing exactly where my money is going; because it's direct, no middle-man; and because I think helping people help themselves is ultimately a better solution than just giving money away

lenders.name: Santa Catalina School
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful opportunity to introduce world geography and social justice! As a privileged Catholic school, "bursting our bubble" is not the easiest experience. Kiva provides a wonderful teaching tool to our students at Santa Catalina School.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I know these people stuggle every single day and I can not imagine the kind of poverty they live with.  It makes me happy that my loan will help them and uplift them and in turn I am repaid with their happiness.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate structural failures and construction accidents to determine cause.

lenders.name: Rachael
lenders.loan_because: its the most amazing tool to directly help individuals
lenders.occupational_info: as a small local business, we design, fabricate, sew and upholster custom furnishings for peoples homes and businesses

lenders.name: Kerri
lenders.loan_because: After seeing this organization on TV, I felt that I was able to help even if it is in such a small manner...someone who is really trying to help themselves.  I wish all of them the best of luck and good furtune!!
lenders.occupational_info: My job...well let's see.  Most of my day is spent in my office, collecting rents from tenants here in Michigan.

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: My mother and I went through great financial difficulties after my parents divorced when I was in high school, so I know how it feels to have to rely on the generosity of other people to get you through day by day.  Today I attend college and have all of my financial needs met through scholarships, grants, and federal loans so I have extra money that I can loan out now.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Lending money to enterprising people makes me feel blessed.  I find that I appreciate the things I have and mourn less of the losses in my life when I am consciously thankful.  I love seing those 100% repaid notices, because I know how awesome it feels to finish payments on something.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: There are so many reasons! It definitely makes me feel great. I love that I am able to make a difference across the world. Also, I think it makes a bigger impact than outright donations. My first loan was a few years ago, and reloaning that same sum of money has contributed to several successful businesses! Amazing.

lenders.name: Lisa and Bill
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a wonderful way to connect with people all across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep all the computers and other technology working in a middle school (students age 12-14) in Saint Paul, MN

lenders.name: Indy Ladies Who Launch
lenders.loan_because: Many people have been wonderful in supporting me in becoming an entrepreneur, and I want to help other women do the same in areas of the world where there are less opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting individuals in achieving a more dynamic and fulfilling life through workshops and one-on-one coaching.

lenders.name: Reine
lenders.loan_because: I was raised by a single mother for most of my life who taught me to never give up no matter what the circumstances.  Now it is time to pay it forward whenever I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major company which provides energy for the Northwest Region of the U.S.

lenders.name: Brooke
lenders.loan_because: I believe that to whom much is given, much is expected.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to successfully resettle refugees from war torn countries across the globe to their challenging new life in the US.

lenders.name: DHJ
lenders.loan_because: Individual economic independence will advance the cause of freedom more than any government or institution
lenders.occupational_info: I help people manage their personal investments and finances.

lenders.name: The Robertson Family
lenders.loan_because: We are thrilled and humbled to be able to do this for other businesses. We own 2 businesses and know the costs of doing business for ourselves. We want to help others attain their goals for their families, and see great success in their business. Great reward is deserved for those who work so hard to make their lives better. Those in need through Kiva deserve help in making their lives better - they are working hard!
lenders.occupational_info: We offer home and commercial mortgage loans for properties located in most of the states in the United States! We offer competitive rates and unbeatable service with access to hundreds of loan programs to fit any need or goal.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: There's a saying that goes "give a man a fish and he can eat for a day; give a man a fishing pole and he can eat for years." Loans seem like a respectful way to help disadvantaged people improve their communities
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a scientist.  My research is focused on preventing cancer.

lenders.name: Eura
lenders.loan_because:
The quality of mercy is not strain'd, 
It droppeth as the gentle rain from heaven 
Upon the place beneath. It is twice blest: 
It blesseth him that gives and him that takes. 

William Shakespeare, "The Merchant of Venice",

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.occupational_info: I help companys provide medical insurance to their retireed employees

lenders.name: Mary Jane
lenders.loan_because: Its a wonderful way to help people become self-sufficient in businesses/interests they operate/own.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, especially women, support their families and raise their communities out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I'm working to finish my education.  I hope to I teach college students about art from all civilizations when I graduate.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: Christ has blessed me with the ability to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently learning visual design for a possible future career in the media industry.

lenders.name: dave kilmartin
lenders.loan_because: It is a very real way to enable others to empower themselves
lenders.occupational_info: work with students to enable them to realise their career potential

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because:
"I awoke and saw that life was service.
I acted and behold, service was joy."

-Rabindranath Tagore

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: It is a practical way to help people accomplish their dreams and goals in life.
lenders.occupational_info: My personal goal is to assist youth in both their formal and informal learning in order to empower them so that they can live out their God given purposes.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: The concept of micro loans is so logical and speaks to individual self-determination rather than government or corporate exploitation.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I can and I am a disciple who is a lender not a borrower.
lenders.occupational_info: Author

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I have started my own business and want to help other people to build theirs.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and write advertisements for TV, Posters, Radio and Internet promoting many different types of products and services.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.  To me, that's obvious.  Even poor folks like me can help fellow humans so far away to create positive change in their lives and communities..
lenders.occupational_info: I raise funds from wealthy private foundations, the government and individual rich people to support the training, performance and community outreach work of a senior and intergenerational  theatre company in Oakland, California.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Every business deserves a chance

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: it's needed.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently in school, on the course towards becoming a nurse.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate and blessed in my life and I would like to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a former high school Spanish teacher and I am currently a graduate student.  I work part time as an undergraduate academic advisor while I am in school.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: 25 dollars is nothing to me but everything to someone else.

lenders.name: Humboldt Geographic Society
lenders.loan_because: Our goal is to connect students and their dollars at Humboldt State University with other human beings at a grass roots level to create a more just global community.
lenders.occupational_info: We channel money from our food sales table into a wide range of Earth-changing non-government organizations.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: its really the least that I can do.  And its fun!!
lenders.occupational_info: I deliver babies.

lenders.name: Shami
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower struggling  hardworking people who have no where else to turn.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: the gift is in the giving.
lenders.occupational_info:
Education encourages growth, and growth encourages understanding.
And understanding will promote peace.  Be a friend and help someone.

lenders.name: Alec & Katie
lenders.loan_because: People need these loans to enrich their lives, and we want to follow God's desire to help them.
lenders.occupational_info: We are creative people and have been blessed with good opportunities for creative, fulfilling work.  Whether making movies, web sites, or planning great events, we want to share our vision across the world for those in need.

lenders.name: Brown Paper Treats
lenders.loan_because: microfinance loans are a productive way to sew into developing communities and affect working poor around the world.  Kiva provides an active way to give and contribute to change in individuals and communitites.
lenders.occupational_info: Brown Paper Treats creates unique baked items for parties and events.  As people purchase our items to celebrate special life moments, we want them to be a part of our effort to give back to those in need.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: Helping people makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes giving back easy!

lenders.name: Chuck
lenders.loan_because: I have enough money  to live on and others need the money a whole lot more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired from the federal government and do volunteer work in an emergency room at a local hospital, deliver meals on wheels, and transport cancer patients for their treatments.

lenders.name: Karen Landis
lenders.occupation: UX Manager, Jewelry and Floral Design
lenders.loan_because: I believe people are worth taking a chance on.
lenders.occupational_info: During the day, I help design web sites. At night, I handcraft jewelry and sculpt flowers.

lenders.name: diana
lenders.loan_because: I care to share and wish I could do more
lenders.occupational_info: Busy

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.loan_because: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give.

lenders.name: Kcowmoo
lenders.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur and I know how hard it is to start a buisness.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: First and foremost, because it is the right thing to do.  Secondly, our country has had a very fortunate economy for the past one hundred years.  Over the next forty years, the economies of India and China are projected to match ours.  Given another ten to twenty years, Brazil and Russia may as well.  Why not help other economies have the same level of success?  Everyone deserves it, we all work the same hard day.  I will do what I can to help small businesses start and grow, and do my part to bring their countries and regions along with them.  We ALL deserve a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people reach their long term financial goals.  My goal is to protect what they have already earned and hopefully help them do more than they could do with just a paycheck.

lenders.name: Keli
lenders.loan_because: The answer to other people's prayers can be found in our own actions.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a music teacher.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: It's a way for me to share what God has abundantly shared with me.
lenders.occupational_info: My specialty is payroll: systems implementation(PeopleSoft 9.1), upgrades, testing, process mapping & improvements, procedural documentation.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.occupation: sometimes work, sometimes teach, sometimes travel

lenders.name: Cristian Petrini
lenders.loan_because:
"Sometimes even to live is an act of courage."

"The best way to predict the future is to create it."

"Be the change you wish to see in the world."
lenders.occupational_info: Living life...

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: I was moved when I heard about Kiva. I think this makes me feel like I'm doing something to help change our world. I think it also makes me feel like I'm a part of the "big picture" outside my immediate community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with adults who have Mental Retardation. I help them improve the way they function in society so they can be more integrated in their communities with less stigma.

lenders.name: Louis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people improve their existence!

lenders.name: Kimber
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people, yeah.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I like to think that this can make a difference.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I was a peace corps volunteer that started a small village savings bank in Tene, Mali (West Africa).  I've seen the impact first hand.

lenders.name: Dagan
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life, and this feels like a good way to give back and contribute to a positive change in the world.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: hard working people across the world deserve access to resources to help improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I publish informational websites

lenders.name: BJ and Charity
lenders.loan_because: It feels like we're making a difference.

lenders.name: Kiersten
lenders.loan_because:
It feels good! 
...and because I can...

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: It is each and every person's responsibility to help change the world

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: I feel that micro-loans help give a person the economic means to become self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently returned from teaching science in Guyana.  Currently, I'm studying Public Interest Law and Policy.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy the feeling I get when I have helped someone.

lenders.name: Bil
lenders.loan_because: I believe capitalism is the way people can pull themselves up and support one another.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: There's no greater service one can do for mankind than to help them achieve their desires/goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an opportunist.  (within reason)

lenders.name: BOB
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do

lenders.name: Dr. Mary
lenders.loan_because: It's another way for me to help someone who needs it- Some loans are made in places I've traveled to or in honor of others who Love certain countries!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I touch others to help their bodies to heal and turn on the Power God gave them!!!

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I could start my small business because of a loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young people how to play a sport called squash.

lenders.name: Vinay
lenders.loan_because: Why shoud'nt I ?
lenders.occupational_info: I am engineer working in the energy business, building and designing gas and power plants.

lenders.name: Leigh Anne
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am Controller by trade and a volunteer by choice.  I volunteer at the Food Bank, Humane Society, Education Foundation and Community Foundation.  I raise puppies for Canine Companions for Independence.

lenders.name: In Memoriam Greg Magie
lenders.occupational_info: Greg was a young man who loved to work with his hands. He designed a hillside waterfall in San Marcos, California.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I can, and it makes so much sense.   I like that it helps people create a living on their own terms, given their own talents, wisdom, background, and local resources.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I care about helping people.  God has blessed me with resources and I like to make them available to others who would appreciate my help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician as well as a nurse.  Right now, I am not working as a nurse but I work part time accompanying choral groups and playing the cello.

lenders.name: DIANE
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for my own good fortune and want to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large nursing home. We care for the elderly and the sick that are no longer able to stay at home.

lenders.name: Saint Bonaventure High
lenders.loan_because: To help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Caring high school students.

lenders.name: Leticia
lenders.loan_because: I believe people deserve the chance to grow and provide income for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organize data and information using a computer.

lenders.name: Khandaker
lenders.loan_because: I am bestowed with more then I deserve by Allah. I would like to loan so that I can fulfill my duty to mankind. If He wanted I could be and still can be on the other end, needing a loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working to find the casue of diseases like asthma in children and multiple sclerosis. I am an epideiologist.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.occupational_info: Prison Guard

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Unlike other giving opportunities, loans leverage the creativity and skills of people in places of need. It creates businesses which may eventually employ others. Loaning direct helps me feel part of an individual's life - there is an emotional connection. Finally, this system bypasses most of the political barriers to making a real difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses be more effective at selling their product or service by using the internet to build relationships with customers.

lenders.name: Darcy
lenders.loan_because: Mum & Dad say I am very lucky and we have to think of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school & gym & swimming, but I love the nintendo DS best of all.

lenders.name: Christie
lenders.loan_because: I have a very good life, and I'm looking for a way to give back.

lenders.name: Rainer
lenders.loan_because: it is time to do something, what  governments, bank and other decisive members of the community cannot do anymore

lenders.name: Sammie & JP
lenders.loan_because:
Both my wife (Sammie) and I (JP) are entrepreneurs and we know the power of entrepreneurship... we want to give back to other entrepreneurs who need cash.

We were fortunate to have each other for cash when we started our businesses.

“Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime”
lenders.occupational_info: I (JP) help businesses make money on the internet.

lenders.name: Jorge & Monica
lenders.loan_because: Coming from Cuba where there is a lot of need, we feel that we should help others to succeed. We enjoy helping others to reach their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Jorge provides IT consulting to Pharmaceutical companies. Monica teaches English as a second language to Kindergarten through 5th grade. Both own and operate a Kitchen Exhaust Cleaning company.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: it feels only right.
lenders.occupational_info: Sales

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: A few years ago, my 5th graders and I decided to do our part to help the fight against global poverty. Our loan money was donated by those students. I keep lending it out to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Assistant Principal for an Elementary School in Virginia.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: ...while it is important to give a person a fish, it is even more important that they are able to fish for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher who has the great privilege of learning from all of my students.  I teach Social Studies and enjoy sharing important information about our "global village" with the kids.  I also use my KIVA.org experiences when teaching Economics--it is a wonderful learning tool!

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.occupational_info: I assist people with disabilities in performing daily activities

lenders.name: omkar
lenders.loan_because: Feed a person, he/she will be hungry next day. Help the person earn his feeding, he will never be hungry
lenders.occupational_info: use the power of Information technology in doing business in an effective and efficient way

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a boost to those who are less fortunate than me and trying to improve their lives
lenders.occupational_info: CFO of hedge fund

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for  the opportunity to share something with people accross the globe. I love that I can connect in this small way and make a difference to an individual
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse taking care of children with cancer and blood diseases. Many of our patients survive and go on to live happy healthy lives so my work is full of joy and beauty.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: Generosity feeds the soul. If only $25 can change someones life,I can skip going out to dinner with friends. I am also a single mom to a young son. I want him to understand how important it is to be good to others. You can't enjoy it unless you give it away! It is so basic, like elementry school: share.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a restaurant manager in  downtown Chicago. It is alot of fun, and I love what I do.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I have worked in East Africa for six years, and I like to think that I can give something back to people in that region.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a paleontologist.

lenders.name: Tim and Marci
lenders.loan_because:
I (Marci) recently read Muhammad Yunus' book, "Banker to the Poor", and was amazed by the effectiveness of microlending at battling poverty.  It’s a simple model with outstanding results because of the spirit and work ethic of these borrowers.  Their stories just inspired and challenged me.

Fortuitously, not long after that a friend told us about Kiva and my heart just started thumping when I saw the site!  Now I can put a face with the stories I’d been so stirred by.   

It thrills Tim and I to know that we can participate in bringing real life change to these businessmen and women!  It is our desire not only to lend to, but to pray for those we sponsor.  God has blessed us abundantly and we want to honor Him by loving His people well. We can’t wait to see them succeed and prosper!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the importance of self-employment as a means to better your future, your family's future and your country's future.  

I am so blessed that I have a responsibility to share my good fortune with others.  This is one small way to fulfill that responsibility.

lenders.name: Joni
lenders.loan_because: As a professional photographer I know how hard it is to get a business up and running, I want to help where the challenges businesswomen face are even greater than mine.
lenders.occupational_info: Photographer

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I operate a small business that sells gas analyzers to measure air pollution from power plants, refineries and other plants, as well as selling research instruments for air pollution and medical research.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I have been heavily involved as an advocate for microcredit for the past 15 years through RESULTS CANADA and have seen how it can help people in industrial and third world countries escape poverty. Many people have brilliant ideas, but no access to collateral. Microcredit is a very valuable and accessible financing tool.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retiree from the Canadian government and spend my time doing community volunteer work with a few organizations. My interest in microcredit comes from being a partner with RESULTS CANADA. I am the president of a non-profit known as Canada Microcredit Educators Group which primarily promotes and develops microcredit.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: it feels like the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I visit people in their homes that have been given 6 months or less to live. I help manage their medications, pain and other symptoms. I help their family care for them in their last days.

lenders.name: Dorie and Terry
lenders.loan_because: We want to assist needy individuals around the World who show the desire to  provide for themselves and their families, and who demonstrate a spirit to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We own our own businesses.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: Hand up > Hand out!

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped, many times, along the path to forming a successful business and finding a rewarding career.  I believe it is an honor to now be able to help others to do the same thing.
lenders.occupational_info: Christina owns a company for which she travels all over the US doing medical research work.  She also studies herbal medicine and makes medicines and products from plants. This part of her business is just starting to grow.

lenders.name: Folorunso
lenders.loan_because: I beleive in real business
lenders.occupational_info: Successful

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.loan_because: I'm happy to contribute to helping some people to accomplish their - small but important - business dream

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to, and my sister is incredibly inspiring.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit to grow and do big things in life. I want to support those who are striving to independently provide for their families while making a dream come true.

lenders.name: Tobias
lenders.occupation: Procurement Officer and a business man
lenders.loan_because: I need to grow economically and advance my education in Supply chain management
lenders.occupational_info: I work five days a week eight hours. However the salary I get cannot sustain my education and the needs of my dependents.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed and I want to help make a difference in a way that makes life better for others--permanently.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with those my company has designated as high potential.  I help them become more self-aware.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Others supported me.  I want to put a different face on America and Americans.
lenders.occupational_info: I figure out smarter way to sell more things to more people.

lenders.name: Tim & Richelle
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed & feel a responsibility to help others.

lenders.name: Maxine
lenders.loan_because: I it's a great way to help people create a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Justin Enco
lenders.loan_because: it is good to help each other
lenders.occupational_info: Musician / Songwriter / Performer

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we in the first world have been given the opportunity to help those less fortunate, and that we must act.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: I want to be of useful service to others.
lenders.occupational_info: help people in their homes with skilled nursing, physical therapy, housekeeping and personal care.

lenders.name: ALISHA
lenders.loan_because: This is a picture of a hut where a family lives. I went to Uganda last year and saw the hardships of people living in developing countries. A small loan to a family can make great changes in their lives. I hope to be a life time member of KIVA
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 9th. grade student trying to make a small difference. And I am a part-time small business lender

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lenders.name: Jeannine
lenders.loan_because: of a purely selfish reason, it feels terrific to give back and knowing that a little can actually make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a global car manufacturer but my job is in the US promoting the US corporate messages to the media. But the real fun is getting to drive new cars :) !

lenders.name: Marah
lenders.loan_because:
I like seeing tangible results for tangible goals. 
I can change a life with a lot less money than you'd think.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with musicians from around the world to get their work publicized in newspapers and magazines. I help get people out to their concerts, and to know about their records.

lenders.name: Paul Mehmi
lenders.loan_because: To help others achieve their dreams and gain a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: Help making a difference in the lives of others.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have an opportunity to better themselves and those whose lives have been touched by others should seek to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I seek to grow and protect my clients' wealth.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed and would like to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Help others with legal problems.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I can...

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: It seems like an easy and painless way to make a positive impact on another person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide information to my co-workers to enable them to do their jobs better and to be more productive.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I am trying to be a better steward of the financial gifts God has given me.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I think it is so wonderful just to help someone get a start.  We have all needed help in our lives before and we should be grateful for it pass it along the way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wildlife photographer and wildlife conservation advocate.  I am fortunate that my work brings me to Africa, India, and Asia and I hope to be able to have the chance to help in these places!

lenders.name: Karola
lenders.loan_because: I want to help when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am teaching youngsters chemistry and physics in a vocational school in southern Finland.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I like to think of myself as an international financier.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be poor and work hard to improve the lives of family members.
lenders.occupational_info: I basically do what I can to keep my clients (who work in investor relations) happy by helping them with whatever they need; if I can not help directly, then I make sure I find someone who can.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way to reach across the world and help those who have great ideas to help themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people make arrangements to transfer their assets and possessions to their loved ones upon their passing.

lenders.name: Panos
lenders.loan_because: I want to give an opportunity to people to have a proper life and live on their own.

lenders.name: Dorothy
lenders.loan_because: I find the economics of microfinance fascinating.  For a long time, I've believed that it would not be governments that lifted the world out of poverty, but rather that it would be other individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I help keep people and projects organized, focused and on-time.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: This world needs all the help it can get at this time.

lenders.name: Monica, Louie and Avery
lenders.loan_because: We know how difficult it is to  run your own business and we want to support others on their road to success!
lenders.occupational_info: Monica owns an event planning business. Louie is a TV/radio host and producer, owning his own entertainment company.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: It's my way of giving back.   I like to support  programs providing microfinancing loans and empowering our less fortunate brothers, help them fund their small businesses hoping that through our own collective efforts, it will bring food on the table, povide roof for a family, and most of all help send kids to school.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for one of the biggest reinsurance company.

lenders.name: Ajit
lenders.loan_because: Have faith in the basic goodness in people.
lenders.occupational_info: Solve complex problems using common sense.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Veronica, Chicago, IL
lenders.loan_because: It is important and needed.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I believe these loans help people, which, in turn, helps the world.

lenders.name: Spencer
lenders.loan_because: the world's a smaller place than we realize...
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a MBA student in New York, studying Corporate Social Responsibility.
---
Je suis étudiant de 2ème cycle á New York.  Je fais mon études sur la résponsabilité sociale des entreprises.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share with others.  The people on Kiva just need an opportunity to gain their independence.  I  especially like to help those that  are trying to educate their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked to put my husband through Medical School back in the 1950's, and raised two daughters. I hope that someday every child in the world will grow up healthy, happy, loved, educated and in peace!

lenders.name: gabby & dave
lenders.loan_because: i can & because i should

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: As a Christian, I am mandated to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I study my butt off!

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: helping people is fun!

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: Deserving people need a chance and I can help a little.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, but live a very busy life.  I have been privileged to have three very different careers.  Now I have a number of interesting activities and I rest a lot in between.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: It makes my heart happy!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Flight Attendant and also a knitwear designer.  My husband and I love to garden, and have lots of hummingbirds in our yard.  (see picture)

lenders.name: nicole
lenders.loan_because: I like to support local businesses; all industries are being monopolized in a sense, and ma and pa stores are getting wiped out...in addition, i will always have a special place in my heart for latin america.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: Someon helped me once, out of the blue, when I needed it most.
lenders.occupational_info: When a regular school teacher is sick, I am called to teach their classes for them.

lenders.name: Jette
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I know how hard running a small business is.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small business where we practice massage and other touch modalities.

lenders.name: Della
lenders.loan_because: I like to give back to the world which has been good to me.
lenders.occupational_info: Being retired, I do volunteer work in my community, for example, tutoring reading for high-school dropouts, editing a fund-raising community cookbook, helping advance President Obama's agenda for progress.

lenders.name: John and Pat
lenders.occupation: retired nurse and semi truck driver

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone succeed.

lenders.name: dawn
lenders.loan_because: I want to share what I have with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a therapist for children in a special school.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to give to others that are less fortunate and hope that my donations make a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Damon & Alicia
lenders.loan_because: We feel very fortunate and want to do something to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell books and Alicia teaches children.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.occupational_info: My organization provides comprehensive security programs to America's schools.

lenders.name: More Life To All
lenders.loan_because: Love is the cure to all the madness of our existence. By allowing Love to motivate our actions we apply to upmost power available to mankind to impact his/her environment. Love indeed conquers All.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: It will make a difference in the life of someone who needs a break and becuase it makes a difference in my life as well.

lenders.name: heather
lenders.loan_because:
it feels good in your heart and you know your helping someone with there journey through life. believe and keep the peace! 
Jamie Smith (daughter) 10 years old wrote this.
lenders.occupational_info:
Entrepreneur who specializes in the Roofing industry in Canada.
Personal Values:
 The continued development of the most Amazing Life!

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others; I enjoy working in other countries as part of a mission to serve.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping my business achieve success through growing talent and helping others discover their God-given talents.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: I think eveyone deserves a chance to make it in the world.  Sometime we need a little help to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a grocery store called TOP Foods.  I merchandise and stock haba(shampoo,soap,toothpaste,etc.) and GM (school supplies,cookware,lightbulbs,etc)

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: this is a unique opportunity to directly help people in need help themselves, and become sustainable.
lenders.occupational_info: I work only part-time as an attorney writing and reviewing agreements for a business. I work full-time as a mom!

lenders.name: Stephanie and Greg
lenders.loan_because: We can make a difference.  We like the idea of giving loans (in lieu of charity), as a loan provides support, plus it promotes dignity and responsibility.  May all your dreams come true!
lenders.occupational_info:
Greg and I both work with computers.  But I'm really a cat lover, and Greg really likes bicycles!

Our friend, Joel, http://www.kiva.org/lender/joel7539, is an inventor and entrepreneur, he is experimenting in the next global currency for rapid and sustainable economic development. Please visit his website and read his White Paper on Sustainable Prosperity at: www.dualcurrency.com/files/wpcomplete.pdf

lenders.name: NYC Triathlon 08 Team 1
lenders.loan_because:
.
The Team says:

We are supporting one of our friends as he raises funds to be used in Kiva, as part of his swim-bike-run in the 2008 New York City Triathlon.

The whole thing sounds kooky to us, but the gleam in the eye of our friend, when he speaks about Kiva, tells us that we should support his efforts.
.
lenders.occupational_info:
Michael says:

My training for, and participation in, the 2008 NYC Triathlon is a fun excuse to put more money into Kiva and expose my friends to how Kiva works.

All of my friends, who are doing this with me, are the offspring of humble men and women who immigrated (whether by force, necessity, or choice).  All of our forebearers came from countries & cultures around the globe.

We are proud of the stuggles they overcame and grateful for the sacrifices they made, in the hopes that we would prosper and have a better life.

We recognize in the Kiva entrepreneurs that same honor and vision for their families.

Our participation in Kiva acknowledges the dreams and goals our ancestors had for us.  We are saying, "We remember you.  We respect the efforts of others like you."
.

lenders.name: Jonathan

lenders.occupational_info: Myself and my partners buy lumber from sawmills in the United States and Canada and sell to contractors

lenders.name: Thomas Foskaris
lenders.loan_because: I love people and want to see them succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: No matter who we are, or where we come from, we can all use a little help every now and again. Kiva gives us an opportunity to help real families from around the world in an enthusiastic, straightforward, direct, thought provoking and impactful way. It makes us proud to see people doing positive things to improve their lives.  And we feel, with all possible humility, a deep sense of care for those whom we have helped and a deep sense of awe that there is still so much more to do in order to help bring the benefits of greater self sufficiency and entrepreneurial wealth to so many needy families in so many parts of the world. This is good work and we are proud to be a part of it.

lenders.name: Jarod
lenders.loan_because: "A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him." - David Brinkley

lenders.name: Matt & Janet
lenders.loan_because:
This is a great idea.  We are happy to loan some of the money that God has blessed us with, to someone who needs it.

Give, and it will be given to you. A good measure, pressed down, shaken together and running over, will be poured into your lap. For with the measure you use, it will be measured to you.”    - Luke 6:38 (NIV)

.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical professional who helps those with breathing problems.  My wife is a medical professional who helps those who want to have a healthier life style. Specificially in the area of nutrition and food.

lenders.loan_because:
Acts of kindness make the world a better place.

Practice the CRACK system:

Continual Random Acts of Compassionate Kindness.
lenders.occupational_info:
Songwriter of poignant tales with universal appeal.  The songs are grounded in personal experiences growing up on the streets of Woodside, Queens, NY. 
Writing influences include Bob Dylan, Jackson Browne, James Taylor, The Beatles and Billy Joel.   
Live with my family in Bedford, NH.
